data.title: Nice scooter spot
data.text: We're just passing through town but stopped here so our son could ride his scooter. This is a very nice, recently renovated skate park.

data.title: New skate park in progress
data.text:
It looks totally awesome and the skaters are going to have the best place to show their stuff. 
Rhodes Skate Park.

data.title: An eclectic mix of skaters and homeless people.
data.text: It seems like a perfectly fine skatepark, but it's right next to the shelter and overpass where homeless people have started up a tent city. I'm sure that most of them are just down on their luck and nothing too horrible has taken place in the area but I wouldn't drop off young children there and after dark things get a bit shady.
